hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:A man was often cheated in buying. The Prophet (ﷺ) said to him, "When you buy something, say (to the seller), No cheating." The man used to say so thenceforward

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ بَاعَ عَلَى الضَّعِيفِ وَنَحْوِهِ
chapter.eng-name: If somebody sells a thing for a weak-minded person
